org.svvrl.goal.core.tran.modella

Class Modella

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractAlgorithm
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractControllableAlgorithm
        • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractEditableAlgorithm
          • org.svvrl.goal.core.tran.AbstractTranslator<LTL,FSA>
            • org.svvrl.goal.core.tran.modella.Modella
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, ControllableAlgorithm, EditableAlgorithm, Translator<LTL,FSA>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExtendedModella

    public class Modella
extends AbstractTranslator<LTL,FSA>
    This class provides an implementation of the MoDeLLa translation algorithm [Roberto Sebastiani, Stefano Tonetta: "More Deterministic" vs. "Smaller" Büchi Automata for Efficient LTL Model Checking. CHARME 2003: 126-140].
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Field Summary

      protected java.util.Set<LTL> promising_formulae
      The promising sub-formulae of the input formula.
      protected java.util.Set<LTLAtomic> props
      The propositions occur in the input formula.

      • groupCoverElementsForPostponement

        protected java.util.Collection<Cover> groupCoverElementsForPostponement(Cover cover)
        Groups the elements in a cover by literals. Elements that have the same set of literals will be put into the same cover in the returned collection.
        Parameters:
        cover - a cover
        Returns:
        a collection of covers, of which each cover contains elements that have the same literals in the input cover

      • isPostponementSafe

        protected boolean isPostponementSafe(Cover cover)
        Returns true of a specified cover can be postponed. A cover can be postponed if all its elements have the same literals and belong to the same acceptance sets.
        Parameters:
        cover - a cover
        Returns:
        true of cover can be postponed

      • postpone

        protected CoverElement postpone(Cover cover)
        Returns the postponed cover of a specified cover.
        Parameters:
        cover - a cover to be postponed
        Returns:
        the postponed cover of cover
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the elements in cover do not have the same literals

      • getPromisedFormula

        Returns the promised formula of a formula in NNF.
        Parameters:
        formula - a formula in NNF
        Returns:
        the promised formula by formula, or null if formula is not promising
